name: politico
text:

name: politico
text:
President Donald Trump's July 4 kickoff speech at Mount Rushmore has only further strained the president's fraught ties with Native Americans  

https://t.co/VGfMLBaUPG

name: politico
text:
More than a dozen states, including Florida, California, Texas and Arizona, broke single-day records in new coronavirus cases this week ahead of the July 4 weekend

https://t.co/hHuczO1mz8

name: politico
text:
Kim Guilfoyle, Donald Trump Jr.'s girlfriend and a top Trump campaign official, tested positive for coronavirus ahead of the president's speech in South Dakota

https://t.co/s4Nh2ga5Nv

name: politico
text:
President Donald Trump on Friday issued a fiery condemnation of a "left-wing cultural revolution" he said is mounting a "radical assault" on American democracy in a speech in front of Mount Rushmore Friday night

https://t.co/LBCcynDggk

name: politico
text:
The Washington Redskins will undergo a “thorough review” of its controversial name as pressure from sponsors mounts

https://t.co/J51g2ECv8Z

name: politico
text:
As scammers looked to cash in on the worldwide hunt for face masks, surgical gowns and gloves, government officials faced a daunting question: 

How exactly would they deal with pandemic-related hoarding and price-gouging?

https://t.co/2jFxKLHTf0

name: politico
text: The White House this past week was facing a familiar series of questions as it grappled with reports of a Russian bounty program targeting American troops in Afghanistan: What did the president know and when did he know it? https://t.co/HrkKXFjvrU

name: politico
text: Voting rights experts say other states should be reaching out to Kentucky for advice, as a potential blueprint for scaling up pandemic-safe voting for the November elections https://t.co/WGuoSG8HXy

name: politico
text: Some education leaders fear the new CDC guidelines on reopening schools are being disregarded, casting doubt on how the new school year will even be able to launch https://t.co/JuZFuixPbF

name: politico
text: There are still four months before the election — and any number of ways for Joe Biden to blow it https://t.co/npUjOKCdA0

name: politico
text: The president and first lady have arrived back in Washington after their visit to Mount Rushmore and are set to participate in July Fourth festivities at the White House this evening https://t.co/qwnBo6geSJ

name: politico
text: It has already been a busy year for the Lincoln Memorial, where both sides have been congregating, eager to claim the symbolic space https://t.co/qvngCbIUcV

name: politico
text: Tehran has triggered a dispute resolution mechanism in the Iran nuclear deal, citing concerns over the implementation of the deal https://t.co/kDEGMm1ZRi
